dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Ministry of Digital Development just published a draft order that's gonna change how people get SIM cards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Ministry of Digital Development just published a draft order that's gonna change how people get S I M cards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Digital Development, Innovation and Aerospace Industry (MDDIAI) has published a draft order amending the rules for providing communication services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that—only official telecom operator outlets can sell them now. No more picking one up at the supermarket or a corner store.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that-only official telecom operator outlets can sell them now. No more picking one up at the supermarket or a corner store.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Once the changes take effect, SIM cards in Kazakhstan will only be available through official telecom operator outlets. This means that mobile phone shops, electronics retailers, supermarkets, and corner stores will no longer be able to sell SIM cards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they're proposing fines for entrepreneurs who keep selling them illegally, which, uh, makes sense given the fraud issues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they're proposing fines for entrepreneurs who keep selling them illegally, which, uh, makes sense given the fraud issues.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan plans to introduce fines for entrepreneurs who continue to sell SIM cards illegally. It is planned to introduce administrative liability in the form of a fine under the Code of Administrative Offenses, the ministry stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the ministry mentioned fraudsters buying SIMs in bulk and sending them abroad to run scams.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the ministry mentioned fraudsters buying SIMs in bulk and sending them abroad to run scams.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Non-official SIM sales are often exploited by fraudsters, who buy SIM cards in bulk and send them abroad, the ministry added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're also looking to limit how many SIMs one person can buy—somewhere between 5 to 10 per person.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're also looking to limit how many SIMs one person can buy-somewhere between five to ten per person.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new amendment under review proposes a limit of 5 to 10 SIM cards per person.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is huge, because currently there's no limit. They said in some cases, over a thousand cards were registered to one individual!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is huge, because currently there's no limit. They said in some cases, over a thousand cards were registered to one individual!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, the law does not regulate how many numbers can be registered to one individual. In some cases, over a thousand SIM cards were issued to a single person and used for fraudulent activities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and most of those were used for fraudulent activities, like those scam calls from abroad using Kazakh numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and most of those were used for fraudulent activities, like those scam calls from abroad using Kazakh numbers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In some cases, over a thousand SIM cards were issued to a single person and used for fraudulent activities. Many scam calls received in Kazakhstan come from abroad using Kazakh numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But the ministry doesn't think this will cause shortages or long lines, since a lot of numbers are issued online via e-SIM now anyway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the ministry doesn't think this will cause shortages or long lines, since a lot of numbers are issued online via e-S I M now anyway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the ministry believes this restriction will not create queues or shortages at telecom operator offices. Most numbers are now issued online via e-SIM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, you don't even need to go into an office for most activations these days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, you don't even need to go into an office for most activations these days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There's no need to visit an operator's office in person.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's a big shift for small businesses that relied on SIM card sales.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's a big shift for small businesses that relied on S I M card sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure, but if it cuts down on fraud, it might be worth the trade-off. The fine amounts aren't specified yet though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure, but if it cuts down on fraud, it might be worth the trade-off. The fine amounts aren't specified yet though.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The amount of the fine has not yet been specified.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the changes are still under public discussion, so nothing's final. But it sounds like they're really trying to crack down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the changes are still under public discussion, so nothing's final. But it sounds like they're really trying to crack down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The proposed changes are currently under public discussion and have not yet come into force.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely—this has been in the works since last October, when Vice Minister Askhat Orazbek first mentioned it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely-this has been in the works since last October, when Vice Minister Askhat Orazbek first mentioned it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans to introduce this limit were first mentioned in October 2023 by then Vice Minister of Digital Development Askhat Orazbek.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Let's see how it plays out. Reducing scam calls would be a win for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's see how it plays out. Reducing scam calls would be a win for everyone.
